name: Yuonger Adventure
description:
Yuonger Adventure is a 2D adventure action game, Yuonger Adventure for those who love challenging games. Your adventure will begin in an unknown man-made zone full of traps, electricity and mages. Try to collect as many energy balls as possible and avoid falling into the clutches of enemies! Avoid traps, abysses and well-aimed shots of technomages! Remember that you can’t trust anyone and you can only rely on your own dexterity. Can you make it to the end?..

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics by Uoini
- Nice soundtrack by TentysTo
- an unforgettable adventure
